constituent: deliberation, say, words, keitai, mouth, righteousness, sheep, ego, hand, fiesta
koohiiStory1: Careful deliberation produces words of righteousness.
koohiiStory2: At the worst of times, a jury´s deliberation descends into a war of words between competing self-righteous, power-tripping bastards.
myStory: quan tâm thảo luận. công bằng lời nói
